title.narrative: EQUITY-FOCUSSED AND CHILD-SENSITIVE SOCIAL PROTECTION MECHANISMS

description.narrative: By 2020, public institutions and decentralised entities in the targeted regions have the capacity to implement national and local mechanisms for equity-focussed and child-sensitive social protection., which contributes to Social Protection, Social Protection (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children and women in vulnerable regions have access to sustainable social protection interventions, including in emergency situations

Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

description.narrative: Foundations are being put into place in national social protection interventions to ensure child and shock responsive measures can ensure improve coverage for children living in poverty including those the most marginalized.; | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/11/2021
